mapper.sql: SELECT id, user_id, param_key, param_value, description, created_at, updated_at FROM user_parameters
mapper.select: WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_parameters ( user_id, param_key, param_value, description, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{paramKey}, #{paramValue}, #{description}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_parameters SET param_key = #{paramKey}, param_value = #{paramValue}, description = #{description}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
